import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' class ReviewCarousel extends Component { state = {currentReview: 1} render() { const {currentReview} = this.state const {reviewsList} = this.props const {imgUrl, username, companyName, description} = reviewsList[ currentReview ] return (

Reviews App

{username}

{companyName}

{description}

) } } export default ReviewCarousel
